text:
Falcon.io is hiring developers in Copenhagen (onsite) - mainly Java Backend, but Python Backend or JavaScript Frontend jobs are also available.

Falcon is a SaaS company that provides a Customer Experience platform, so we have a range of different products to work on and lots of data to work with.

We are looking for developers that are passionate without being religious. You love experimenting but also strive for excellence.

We like to see what you build so we usually send a little challenge as part of the recruitment process which you get to discuss with our Director of Engineering. Read more about Falcon and our Backend engineering job here: https://jobs.lever.co/falcon/b72d99ae-23b6-4cce-bb51-d79b330...
